My new manager who joined from Amazon is so annoying. He tries to micromanage me and my work. The other day, he suggested that I implement something a different way and we went back and forth because there was nothing better about his suggestion, he just wanted it implemented his way. He also doesnt understand Apple culture and I have to force myself not to roll my eyes whenever he suggest to do thing like at Amazon.

Dont Amazon my Apple.

#amazon
